Text: Just use Audacity if you cant get this to work. Tutorials all over the net.

Just get SoundTap (crack available on TPB), it will record audio straight from the soundcard, thus being able to 'download' music from MySpace.

It works. Only simpletons can't figure it out. If you have any trouble just click the help button. Basically all you have to do is enter the MySpace ID of what band you want to download, play and download.
